attributes.action: Women peadophiles should be treated the same as men
attributes.additional_details:
Woman peadophiles should be treated the same as male peadophiles.Currently they are let off with a caution. There have been several cases were the police have failed to act, even taken one victims religious beliefs into account. A male in a similar position would have been jailed.
I urge the government to act on this. Male victims of female peadophiles are the silent victims.
